quiz.question: What is the main idea behind the Coin Change problem?
options: Find the minimum coins to reach a total
Find the maximum number of coins
Sort coins and take the largest first
Use a greedy approach for all amounts
quiz.answer: Find the minimum coins to reach a total

quiz.question: Coin Change problem can be solved efficiently using:
Time complexity of the DP solution for Coin Change (with amount n and m coins) is:
Is greedy always optimal for Coin Change?
Coin Change is similar to which classical problem?

hackerrank_problems.title: The Coin Change Problem
hackerrank_problems.description: Compute the number of ways to make change for a given amount using DP.

hackerrank_problems.title: The Coin Change Problem II
hackerrank_problems.description: Determine the minimum number of coins required to form a total amount.

hackerrank_problems.title: Maximum Subarray Sum
hackerrank_problems.description: Apply DP techniques similar to Coin Change for modular subarray sums.
